messages.title: Don’t be conned by the Conservatives
messages.content: Tory campaign chief Lord Ashcroft is spending millions of pounds on negative campaigning to try to defeat hardworking Lib Dem MPs at the election. The Conservatives know that Liberal Democrat MPs have a strong record of action that can’t be matched. Voters won’t be fooled by these desperate Conservative tactics.

messages.title: Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver for you
messages.content: It was Nick Clegg’s Lib Dems who delivered Gordon Brown’s first ever Parliamentary defeat on a fair deal for the Gurkhas.

messages.title: In many parts of Britain... It’s a two horse race
messages.content: Labour is in a distant third place and cannot win in many areas. Supporting them just helps the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats delivered a first ever Parliamentary defeat for Gordon Brown resulting in a fair deal for the Gurkhas.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour is in a distant third place and cannot win in many areas. Supporting them just helps the Conservatives.

housing.content: Gurkhas were delivered a fair deal.

quotes.text: Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour MPs.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats campaign leaflet highlighting strategic voting and their successes.
